scripts.start: npm run replica && npm run create-canisters && npm run deploy && npm run vite
scripts.replica: dfx stop && rm -rf .dfx power-equalizer/.dfx && dfx start --clean --background
scripts.generate: cd power-equalizer && DFX_MOC_PATH="$(vessel bin)/moc" dfx generate staging && cp -rf declarations/main/* ../src/declarations/ext/ && cd ..
scripts.deploy:power-equalizer: . ./set-deploy-env.zsh && cd power-equalizer && npm run deploy:ledger && npm run deploy local -- --mode reinstall
scripts.deploy:ledger: . ./set-deploy-env.zsh && dfx deploy ledger --no-wallet --mode reinstall -y --argument '(record {minting_account = "'$(dfx ledger account-id)'"; initial_values = vec { record { "'$WALLET_ADDRESS'"; record { e8s=100_000_000_000 } }; }; send_whitelist = vec {}})'
scripts.postinstall: cd power-equalizer && npm install && vessel install
